posts.name: Bellevue Diner
posts.note: The Bellevue Diner is an authentic Greek and Mediterranean diner with an emphasis on locally-sourced ingredients from Nashville. They serve up home-cooked, affordable meals in an American diner setting. People have been known to fall in love with their gyros, burgers, Greek omelettes, pasta dishes, eggs Benedict, and wraps.

posts.name: The Grilled Cheeserie
posts.note: The Grilled Cheeserie is a popular food truck is serving up artisanal grilled cheese sandwiches and seasonal bites at the counter. You need to order the pimento cheese grilled mac and cheese.

posts.name: Martin’s Bar-B-Que Joint
posts.note: Martin’s Bar-B-Que Joint has a pit for cooking whole pigs which dominates the homey dining room at this popular BBQ emporium. NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Mas Tacos Por Favor
posts.note: Mas Tacos Por Favor is a snug, no-frills Mexican restaurant fixing up an array of tacos and other standards. You need to order the holiday tamales and quinoa veggie tacos or the Pozole Verde soup.

posts.name: Prince's Hot Chicken Shack
posts.note: Prince's Hot Chicken Shack is known for Nashville's unique deep-fried poultry specialty, spiced from mild to ultra hot levels. I went with medium spicy because I figured I could go hotter next time instead of burning my mouth off.
